spec:
Code quality gates:
- Place a CI pipeline step that runs: npm test, npm run lint, npm run build when package.json exists in that repo path.
- Implementation: Add a GitHub Actions workflow .github/workflows/code-quality.yml that detects JS/TS packages under netnet/cockpit and runs the commands.
- Acceptance: workflow runs on PR and passes; workflow artifacts show test output. Done when workflow file exists and a sample PR triggers success.

UI/UX design system pass:
- Implement a design tokens file at netnet/cockpit/src/styles/design-tokens.ts with spacing, typography, colors, and status badge components at netnet/cockpit/src/components/Badge.tsx.
- Acceptance: All cockpit pages import design-tokens; manual QA checklist (consistency, spacing, typography) saved to docs/ui/checklist.md. Done when component library exports Badge and token file referenced by at least 2 pages.

Work templates library:
- Add templates under netnet/cockpit/src/templates/*.json for deploy, revenue-idea, content-pack, lead-pack, automation-sprint.
- Each template includes fields, example payload, and a render helper netnet/cockpit/src/templates/index.ts exporting listTemplates().
- Acceptance: templates can be fetched via API client lib/apiClient.ts and validated by unit tests under tests/templates_test.py. Done when templates present and tests pass.

Revenue program: Content Pack:
- Implement pipeline under netnet/cockpit/src/revenue/content_pack.ts that accepts inputs and emits artifact bundle stored to netnet/storage/content/<id>.zip (or IPFS hash placeholder).
- Acceptance: function createContentPack(inputs) returns metadata including storage path and hash; unit test validates sample inputs produce artifact and metadata. Done when endpoint and tests are added.

Revenue program: Lead Pack:
- Implement netnet/cockpit/src/revenue/lead_pack.ts which ingests leads data and produces CSV plus outreach copy and tracking fields.
- Acceptance: createLeadPack(inputs) returns {csvPath, outreachCopy, tracking}. Unit test verifies CSV schema and content. Done when file and tests are added.

Net Benefit Receipt enforcement:
- Add schema and validator at netnet/cockpit/src/receipts/receipt.ts that enforces: ValueDelivered, ReceiptStatus (DONE|PENDING), NextRunRecommendation.
- Acceptance: validator rejects incomplete bundles; runner attaches receipt to job metadata. Unit tests under tests/receipts_test.py. Done when validator and tests exist.

Deploy Netnet stable URL:
- Provide deployment documentation and scripts: docker-compose.yml addition in netnet/deploy/, systemd unit example netnet/deploy/netnet.service, nginx config netnet/deploy/nginx.conf.
- Acceptance: docs/deploy.md describes steps and scripts present. Done when files exist and docs validated.

Auth / operator key:
- Implement simple operator auth middleware in netnet/cockpit/src/server/auth.ts reading header X-Operator-Key matched against env OPERATOR_KEY.
- Acceptance: protected endpoints return 401 without header. Tests under tests/auth_test.py. Done when middleware and tests exist.

Autonomy modes:
- Add UI control at netnet/cockpit/src/components/AutonomyMode.tsx with modes OFF/PROPOSE/EXECUTE and policy envelope editor.
- Backend policy stored at netnet/cockpit/src/policy/modes.json and enforced by worker (config flag).
- Acceptance: switch changes behavior in UI and worker reads policy. Tests: integration test toggles mode and verifies worker respects caps.

Execution Adapter Layer:
- Implement adapter interface netnet/cockpit/src/adapter/adapter.ts with methods runJob(job,opts) and local + conway adapters implementing it at adapter/local.ts and adapter/conway.ts.
- Acceptance: worker routes execution via adapter.runJob. Unit tests mock adapters. Done when adapters and tests added.

Conway Remote Compute Adapter:
- Implement conway adapter netnet/cockpit/src/adapter/conway.ts that provisions a sandbox, executes command via SSH/API, captures stdout/stderr, returns exit code and outputs. No autonomy features enabled.
- Acceptance: adapter returns structured result for sample command. Tests use a mock remote. Done when implemented and tested.

Resource & Spend Guardrails:
- Implement policy enforcement at netnet/cockpit/src/policy/guardrails.ts with per-job limits: maxRuntimeMs, maxSpendUsd, approvalRequired boolean.
- Worker consults guardrails before run; if exceeded, requests approval.
- Acceptance: guardrails config present and unit tests validate enforcement.

Operator layout overflow + sticky composer:
- UI fix in netnet/cockpit/src/components/OperatorLayout.tsx to prevent hidden buttons and make composer sticky.
- Acceptance: visual regression test or manual QA checklist; unit/storybook story demonstrating fix. Done when component updated and story added.

Kindergarten mode toggle:
- Add toggle in UI at netnet/cockpit/src/components/KindergartenToggle.tsx which activates simplified labels and tooltips across UI.
- Acceptance: mode toggles simplified text; tests verify presence of tooltips. Done when component and tests present.

VEALTH_SYSTEM.md + System viewer:
- Add VEALTH_SYSTEM.md at repo root and in-app viewer at netnet/cockpit/src/pages/system.tsx which displays VEALTH_SYSTEM.md content.
- Acceptance: viewer renders file and is accessible via /system route. Done when file and page exist and tested.
Code quality gates: Run npm test / npm run lint / npm run build when available; post results in events.
UI/UX design system pass: Make cockpit “calm, dense, usable": consistent components, spacing, typography, status badges.
Work templates library: Job templates: deploy, revenue-idea spec, content pack, lead pack, automation sprint. Phase D — Revenue programs + regen receipts
Revenue program: Content Pack: Run v1 Inputs → outputs artifact bundle (hooks/captions/scripts) stored and linked.
Revenue program: Lead Pack: Run v1 CSV output + outreach copy + tracking fields.
Net Benefit Receipt enforcement: DONE requires completion bundle: Value Delivered + Receipt (or PENDING) + Next Run Recommendation.
Deploy Netnet stable URL: HTTPS + reverse proxy; Systemd/pm2, nginx, domain, TLS, protected endpoints.
Auth / operator key: Simple header token or basic auth for destructive endpoints (worker trigger, seeding).
Autonomy modes: UI + policy envelope OFF / PROPOSE / EXECUTE, caps, allowlists, kill switch shown in cockpit.
Execution Adapter Layer: Abstract execution target in worker: "local" or "conway". All job execution routes through this adapter boundary.
Conway Remote Compute Adapter: Implement Conway as controlled remote executor: provision sandbox, run command, capture output, post event.
Resource & Spend Guardrails: Enforce per-job limits: max runtime, max spend, approval flag required, visible policy in cockpit.
Operator layout overflow + sticky composer: Fix hidden buttons / reachability
Kindergarten mode toggle: tooltips + simplified labels + guided next action
VEALTH_SYSTEM.md + System viewer: in-app "System" viewer tab (agent + human share the same truth)
